thread.section_title: Le Robinet d'Or - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Favorite hotel in Paris
thread.title_full: Favorite hotel in Paris - Review of Le Robinet d'Or, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Tiffany S
title: Favorite hotel in Paris
text: This was my third time in Paris and Le Robinet d'Or is by far my favorite. The room was very spacious and clean. They put a lot of attention to every little detail to make the room comfortable and accommodating. Although the hotel doesn't have an elevator, the staff there helped us with our luggage to our room and when we checked out. They also provide complimentary bottled water in the lobby. Would definitely stay here again the next time I visit Paris.
